evidence.claim: Amphenol CMT utilizes AWS services for hosting and data management.
The company implements HIPAA compliance measures for its healthcare technology solutions.
Amphenol CMT's platform supports HL7 FHIR standards for healthcare integration.
Use of Azure DevOps for improving software development processes has been documented.
Integration patterns utilize RESTful APIs for connecting with EHR systems.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 or healthcare data exchange use cases.
